## JsonCompatible.RecordValidator type

A validator which validates a record of [JsonCompatible](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md) values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RecordValidator<T, TC = unknown, TK extends string = string> = Validation.Validator<Record<TK, JsonCompatibleType<T>>, TC>;
```
